page.title: 14CLUBS IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: The Golf Club is the major private club in Cruden Bay. It consists of a Club House, and an 18 hole, and 9 hole course. There are 600 male members, 200 female members and a large number of junior members. The annual subscription is Â£80 for men, Â£70 for women and Â£12 for juniors.(under 18) The green fees are Â£6 and Â£8 at the weekend.Other clubs are:- outdoor bowls, indoor bowls, senior citizens, Kafdo Karate, Young Ornothologists, Mother and toddler, 4-5 Playgroup, Village Hall Playgroup, Dramatic Club, Horticultural Society, Model railway club, Boy's Brigade(3 age groups), Guides and Brownies, Womens' Rural Institute, 2 Youth Clubs, Hobbies Club.
